RealScout - Rails Engineers/Front-end Engineers/Data Engineers/Data Scientists - Mountain View, CA - Full-time

We pair program [1], hold hack days every other Friday [2], and have recently improved test coverage from 45% to 80%. The focus seems to be paying off: In the first half of 2015, our agents have closed $1.1 billion in sales and this number is growing quickly.

(Check out our latest hack days project we released last week: an Atmel AVR 8bit microchip emulator [3] built with Rust, React.js, Redux.js and Docker.)

We're on the way to Series B being previously backed by Joe Lonsdale (Palantir founder), Ken DeLeon (2012's #1 Realtor) and several others ($7m to date)

If you're interested in helping to shape and mold engineering culture and technology in a small and growing team, feel free to reach me at chris (at) realscout.com.

-Chris
